org.apache.beam.sdk.io.cassandra

Interface CassandraService<T>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CassandraServiceImpl

    public interface CassandraService<T>
extends java.io.Serializable
    An interface for real or fake implementations of Cassandra.

      static interface  CassandraService.Writer<T>
      Writer for an entity.
